History
-------

++++++++++++++++++

* Updated documentation with previously missing configuration option.

++++++++++++++++++

* Fixed bug with Django's HTTP header names (Thanks @Fizzadar!)

++++++++++++++++++

* Preliminary Python 3.4 support.

++++++++++++++++++

* PyPI release.

0.0.1 (2014-08-01)
++++++++++++++++++

* Initial release on GitHub.
